title: Courses
description: Embark on a journey of continuous learning with our curated selection of online courses. Explore a variety of platforms offering in-depth programs on programming, web development, data science, and more!

items.title: Alura
items.description: Learn programming, front-end, back-end, data science, UX, DevOps, innovation, and management on Brazil's largest technology platform. (Content primarily in Portuguese)

items.title: Curso em Video
items.description: Enhance your resume with free video courses from Curso em Video.  Learn computer science concepts through courses created by experts. (Content primarily in Portuguese)

items.title: DevMedia
items.description: Learn to code for real with DevMedia.  Their approach focuses on practical application through real projects, encouraging questions and interaction with other programmers. (Content primarily in Portuguese)

items.title: DIO
items.description: Build your portfolio with marketplace projects. Develop innovative projects and create solutions together with experts to keep your portfolio up-to-date.

items.title: EBAC
items.description: EBAC offers a fast and convenient way to learn design and contemporary professions online.  Explore open classes, online intensives, and courses designed for rapid learning. (Content primarily in Portuguese)

items.title: edX
items.description: Pursue accredited online courses from top universities and institutions on edX. Explore a wide range of subjects, including computer science, data science, and software development, offered at various levels.

items.title: freeCodeCamp
items.description: freeCodeCamp is a community of people from all around the world who are learning to code together.

items.title: Pluralsight
items.description: Expand your knowledge with Pluralsight's library of video tutorials on programming, IT operations, and creative skills.  Choose from subscription plans offering access to a vast collection of courses by industry experts.

items.title: Rocketseat
items.description: The complete platform to learn programming from scratch at your own pace.  Become a full-stack developer and specialize in various technologies without leaving home. (Content primarily in Portuguese)

items.title: Udacity
items.description: Upskill or reskill with Udacity's nanodegree programs.  These intensive courses focus on specific career paths, combining video lessons, hands-on projects, and mentor support to prepare you for in-demand jobs.
